summary: How do you see Cyrus and Tj making up? Will Tj tell Cyrus why he bailed on the costume or...?
question: How do you see Cyrus and Tj making up? Will Tj tell Cyrus why he bailed on the costume or...?
answer: i honestly don’t know because there’s so many ways this could go. they could make up in the next ep they’re in together where tj apologizes without telling cyrus how he feels or coming out to him, just saying that she blackmailed him, or they could draw out the angst until the finale and have him finally apologize then with a confession and they end up getting together (which may or may not explain why tj isn’t at the wedding). or they could have tj apologize in the next ep they’re in together but cyrus doesn’t accept it bc it isn’t sincere enough like other people have theorized, and then they finally talk it through in the finale. i have no idea how tj is going to apologize bc i don’t know what to expect, it could either be a stunning execution of a plotline, or massively underwhelming and they just shove it all to the background and barely mention it. this apology isn’t like any of the others that tj has had to make, so for the first time in a long ass time i cannot predict what’s going to happen

summary: everyone is talking about episode descriptions for 314 and 315 but there's no evidence the ones imdb are real, is there? they...
question: everyone is talking about episode descriptions for 314 and 315 but there's no evidence the ones imdb are real, is there? they just seem like they could be (bc they're not crack'd ones, they're based on stuff we already know or at least, they seem plausible) but i haven't seen anything official
answer: They’re fake. I’m usually the person who posts the ep descriptions (I’m a credible source by the way!) and I get them straight from the Disney Press site. Besides, no new episodes are even airing in April, so we wouldn’t get any ep titles or ep descriptions until the end of April (assuming that episodes start running again in May). Anyone can edit IMBD and this is not the first time someone has made fake synopsi using it so please be cautious and don’t believe everything you see!

summary: EPISODE DESCRIPTIONS ON IMDB FOR 14 AND 15. What are your theories??
question: EPISODE DESCRIPTIONS ON IMDB FOR 14 AND 15. What are your theories??
answer:
My theory is that they are fake and were written by a fan with basic knowledge of what we should expect to see in the next few episodes. We know that Buffy and Marty are going to have the marathon storyline. We know that Amber is going to “help” Andi deal with her rage. And we know that Cyrus’ issues with TJ are unresolved and will likely be addressed at some point. We know the wedding will have to be discussed at some point. And we know that TJ and Kira still should have more basketball scenes in the park. They basically just took basic knowledge and wrote fake descriptions to give people something to talk about.

But they left out some stuff that definitely would have been more likely to be included. Like the fact that Bex and Bowie still have to tell Cece that they aren’t getting married. Or the fact that Amber and Jonah’s storyline may be addressed again. Or the fact that there is a police officer involved in 315.

So yeah, the descriptions obviously aren’t entirely wrong, but they aren’t accurate or official by any means.

blog.name: tjskipping

tags: pls show up in the tag
summary: could have been
body:
could have been

AO3 link

tj isn’t an idiot. he knows cyrus likes him. or at least has some form of more-than-platonic feelings for him.

he sees the subtle (but not subtle enough) glances, inconspicuous except for the way cyrus seems to be slightly in awe. he’d assumed for a while that it was normal, that was how he was with everyone. but when he sees cyrus talk to buffy, then andi, then jonah, no sight of the Look, he begins to realize what it means. oh.

he sees the way cyrus seems to shift as he enters, as if slightly more aware of everything. aware of tj.

he sees cyrus lean slightly into him, as if he doesn’t realize what he’s doing. as if wanting to be near tj is just instinct.

he sees the look buffy and andi exchange behind them, smug and fond and knowing. tj wants to yell a little, what do you know? tell me.

he sees cyrus grin; the way his eyes scrunch up, soft and sweet and i trust you. i like you. he sees cyrus. he notices him. and then doesn’t stop noticing.

“you can be oblivious”

he’s not. he’s not. he’s notnotnot.

he sees everything. he recognizes it. because that’s him.

the way tj is always aware of cyrus, aware of every near-hug, every brush of their hands, aware of cyrus.

the way tj can feel himself light up when he sees cyrus. a smile spreading on his face just at the thought of him. warmth spreading through him, even hours later.

the way he finds himself searching out cyrus’ gaze in a room, looking to share a smile, even if they can’t talk.

the way he finds himself wanting to just be with cyrus. just being. no pretenses, no games, no hesitations. just them, together.

he recognizes it because it’s the same subtle signs he had to identify in himself first. that shift from oh, i like boys to oh, i like my best friend to oh, i like cyrus.

it’s not a dawning realization. it’s like a smack in the face. a pretty pleasant smack, but still sudden and shocking and leaving him a little breathless.

he wonders at first, if he should confess now. isn’t this what happens? when two people like each other? confessions and kisses and i love yous, murmured or yelled or blurted out. isn’t this supposed to work out now?

love—or like—tj is learning, isn’t really like what he sees around him. isn’t like what’s on tv, or what he can hear the other children gossip about around him.

it’s- different. how can it not be, when it’s cyrus.

he thinks about confessing. he thinks about all the kisses and the hand holding and the i like yous they could have. a logical i-like-you-you-like-me-can-we-date scenario.

he remembers listening about jonah and andi, and buffy and marty from cyrus. feels a little better that he’s not the only one with complicated feelings.

it’s not like he wouldn’t want to do any of that. the thought of letting cyrus know makes him giddy.

but.

he’s scared. it’s dumb but he’s scared.

he thinks of possible broken friendships. of arguments and miscommunications and possibly hurting cyrus. he doesn’t want that. he doesn’t want them to be ruined.

what ifs eat at him for the entire minute he considers confessing. he gives in. not yet.

looking back at cyrus, helpless as he’s being led away by kira against his will, he thinks a little bitterly about how it doesn’t matter anyway. not after this.

summary: What superheroes would characters dress up as?
question: What superheroes would characters dress up as?
answer:
Andi would be Captain Marvel

Buffy would be Valkyrie

Amber would be Phoenix

Iris would be Wonder Woman

TJ would be Spiderman (or Red Hood maybe)

Jonah would be Batman

Cyrus would be Captain America

Marty would be Green Lantern (or Scott Lang’s Ant-Man)

summary: what do you think a marty/andi friendship would look like?? because i mean like they’d spend a lot of time around each other,...
question: what do you think a marty/andi friendship would look like?? because i mean like they’d spend a lot of time around each other, but i cant imagine what theyre interactions would be like
answer: In my head Andi and Marty are like… chill bros. Not that close but can make each other laugh. Maybe they share snacks sometimes while they’re watching their friends be ridiculous. They’re very different people so they don’t have much in common to discuss except their social circle so their main method of bonding is by having gossip sessions while avoiding homework.

They’re very different people so they don’t have much in common to discuss except their social circle so their main method of bonding is by having gossip sessions while avoiding homework.

tags: star vs the forces of evil
star vs. the forces of evil
summary: Here’s Disney Channel Canada’s Schedule for March 25-31. Beginning last week, more reruns of Star vs. the Forces of Evil were...
caption:
Here’s Disney Channel Canada’s Schedule for March 25-31.

Beginning last week, more reruns of Star vs. the Forces of Evil were added on Weekdays. An encore of “Rapunzel and the Great Tree” airs Saturday, it premiered in Canada on March 24. 

Sunday, March 31 is the Series Finale of the Mini-Series, Fast Layne. There’s also New Episodes of Bizaardvark, Coop & Cami Ask the World, Milo Murphy’s Law, Rapunzel’s Tangled Adventure (”The Brothers Hook; Rapunzel: Day One”), Sydney to the Max, and Undercover High.

reblog.comment:

Sunday, March 31 is the Series Finale of the Mini-Series, Fast Layne. There’s also New Episodes of Bizaardvark, Coop & Cami Ask the World, Milo Murphy’s Law, Rapunzel’s Tangled Adventure (”The Brothers Hook; Rapunzel: Day One”), Sydney to the Max, and Undercover High.

summary: You know whats really annoying with the AM fandom is that Reed had a gun and everyone keeps saying “he’s just an innocent boy...
body: You know whats really annoying with the AM fandom is that Reed had a gun and everyone keeps saying “he’s just an innocent boy who made a mistake” but NO. He knew what he was doing and he shouldn’t get all the praise that he does. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk.

summary: Jonah is going to be so confused when he gets together with the GHC again. Andi will be staring at wedding magazines and has...
body: Jonah is going to be so confused when he gets together with the GHC again. Andi will be staring at wedding magazines and has refused to talk about it, Cyrus is swearing off muffins and won’t go near salt, Buffy is falling back into “I will beat everyone at things” and signing up for a marathon.
